info.description:
Complete API collection for MenuLogs - Restaurant Menu Management SaaS Platform

**Base URL:** `{{base_url}}/api/v1`

**üîó NEW: Slug-Based URLs**
- Locations now support SEO-friendly slugs (e.g., `downtown-pizza`)
- Public menu available at: `/public/locations/by-slug/:slug/menu`
- Use `/locations/check-slug/:slug` to verify availability
- See "üåê Public API" section for slug-based endpoints

**üì§ NEW: File Upload Support**
- Business, Category, Banner, and MenuItem create/update endpoints now support file uploads
- Accept both JSON (application/json) and multipart/form-data
- For file uploads: use `image` field (single file) or `images` field (multiple files)
- Files are automatically uploaded to S3, optimized, and URLs are stored
- Old files are automatically deleted from S3 when updated
- Max file size: 10MB per file
- Supported formats: JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF

**Authentication:**
- Use Bearer token in Authorization header
- Access token expires in 15 minutes
- Use `/auth/refresh` to get new token

**Demo Credentials:**
- Email: `demo@restaurant.com`
- Password: `demo123`

**Setup:**
1. Import this collection
2. Import environment variables
3. Run "Auth - Login" to get access token
4. Token will be automatically saved to `accessToken` variable

request.description:
Check if a slug is available for use.

**Slug Requirements:**
- 3-50 characters
- Lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only
- Must start/end with alphanumeric
- No consecutive hyphens
- Globally unique

**Query Parameters:**
- `excludeId` (optional): Location ID to exclude when checking (useful for updates)

**Response:**
- `available: true` - Slug is available
- `available: false` - Slug is already taken

request.description:
Create a new location (restaurant branch).

**Note:** Automatically starts with 14-day free trial.

**Body:**
- `businessId` (required): Business UUID
- `name`, `address`, `city`, `state`, `zipCode`, `country`, `phone`, `email` (required)
- `slug` (optional): URL-friendly identifier (e.g., `downtown-branch-nyc`)
  - Auto-generated from `name` + `city` if not provided
  - Must be 3-50 characters, lowercase alphanumeric + hyphens only
  - Must be globally unique
  - Use `/locations/check-slug/:slug` to verify availability
- `openingHours` (required): JSON object with days of week
- `isActive` (optional): Defaults to true

**Slug Examples:**
- `downtown-pizza`
- `times-square-bistro`
- `brooklyn-sushi-bar`
Get details of a specific location.

Update location details. All fields are optional.

**Slug Updates:**
- `slug` can be updated after creation
- Must pass uniqueness check (excluding current location)
- Use `/locations/check-slug/:slug?excludeId={locationId}` to verify availability before updating
Delete a location. **Warning:** This will cascade delete all categories, menu items, and banners for this location.

request.description:
Create a new menu item.

**Supports two request formats:**

1. **JSON (application/json)** - For backward compatibility:
   - `categoryId` (required): Category UUID
   - `name`, `description`, `price`, `image` (required)
   - `images` (optional array): Array of image URLs/base64 (max 3)
   - `video`, `ingredients`, `allergens`, `tags` (optional arrays)
   - `nutritionalInfo` (optional JSON object)
   - `isVegetarian`, `isVegan`, `isGlutenFree` (optional booleans)
   - `spicyLevel` (optional, 0-5)
   - `availability` (optional): IN_STOCK, OUT_OF_STOCK, HIDDEN
   - `preparationTime` (optional string)

2. **Multipart/form-data** - For file uploads:
   - `categoryId` (required): Category UUID
   - `name` (required): Menu item name
   - `description` (required): Description
   - `price` (required): Price as number or string
   - `images` (optional, multiple): Image files (JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF) - up to 3 images
   - `video` (optional): Video URL
   - `ingredients` (optional): JSON string array or comma-separated
   - `allergens` (optional): JSON string array or comma-separated
   - `tags` (optional): JSON string array or comma-separated
   - `nutritionalInfo` (optional): JSON string
   - `isVegetarian`, `isVegan`, `isGlutenFree` (optional): true/false strings
   - `spicyLevel` (optional): 0-5 as string
   - `availability` (optional): IN_STOCK, OUT_OF_STOCK, HIDDEN
   - `preparationTime` (optional): String

**Note:** If `images` files are provided, they will be uploaded to S3 (max 1920x1920, auto-resized). First image becomes the main image.

Update menu item details. All fields are optional.

**Supports two request formats:**

1. **JSON (application/json)** - For backward compatibility:
   - All fields same as create (all optional)

2. **Multipart/form-data** - For file uploads:
   - Same fields as create (all optional)
   - `images` (optional, multiple): Image files (up to 3) - replaces all existing images
   - Arrays should be sent as JSON strings in form-data

**Note:** If `images` files are uploaded, old images will be deleted from S3 and replaced. Images not in the new set will be removed.
Delete a menu item.

Update menu item availability.

**Body:**
- `availability` (required): IN_STOCK, OUT_OF_STOCK, or HIDDEN

Create a new subscription for a location.

**Plans (Per Location):**
- `FREE` - ‚Çπ0/month - Free trial (20 menu items, 5 categories, 0 banners)
- `STANDARD` - ‚Çπ499/month (‚Çπ4,990/year) - 100 menu items, 20 categories, 5 banners, 2GB storage
- `PROFESSIONAL` - ‚Çπ1,499/month (‚Çπ14,990/year) - 500 menu items, 50 categories, 20 banners, 10GB storage, custom domain, API access
- `CUSTOM` - Custom pricing - Unlimited everything, white label, SSO, dedicated support

**Billing Cycles:**
- `MONTHLY` - Standard monthly billing
- `YEARLY` - 17% discount (billed annually)

**Note:** All new locations get 14-day free trial. Subscription is per location - businesses can have unlimited locations.

Change subscription plan or billing cycle.

**Body:**
- `plan` (required): New plan (FREE, STANDARD, PROFESSIONAL, CUSTOM)
- `billingCycle` (optional): MONTHLY or YEARLY

**Notes:**
- Upgrading takes effect immediately with prorated billing
- Downgrading takes effect at next billing cycle
- Downgrading to FREE removes paid features
- Feature flags are automatically updated based on plan

Cancel a subscription.

**Note:**
- Cancellation takes effect at end of billing cycle
- Location is automatically downgraded to FREE plan
- Access continues until billing cycle ends

Get all invoices and billing history for a location.

**Response includes:**
- Invoice amount and status
- Payment dates
- Razorpay payment IDs
- Invoice descriptions

Get current usage statistics and plan limits for a location.

**Response includes:**
- Current plan and limits
- Current usage (menu items, banners)
- Usage percentages
- Helps determine if upgrade is needed

request.description:
Handle Razorpay webhook events.

**Events Handled:**
- `subscription.activated` - Subscription activated
- `subscription.charged` - Payment charged
- `subscription.cancelled` - Subscription cancelled
- `payment.failed` - Payment failed

**Security:**
- Requires `X-Razorpay-Signature` header
- Signature verified using webhook secret
- Invalid signatures are rejected

**Note:** This endpoint does NOT require Bearer token authentication. It uses signature verification instead.
